content: lion brand pattern # 70315ad skill level beginner level 1 homespun® article #790 7 colors 1 ball each *plum saffron chili apple green dusty blue lagoon earth* crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm work 5 strips in half_double_crochet u s alternating colors in each strip creates a patchwork effect when assembled *lion brand patterns are written in u s crochet terminology * *free registration at site required to access patterns *
